name: The Fool
daily_meaning: A fresh start beckons — embrace the unknown and let your spirit wander.

name: The Magician
daily_meaning: Harness your talents today — the universe conspires in your favor.

name: The High Priestess
daily_meaning: Trust your inner voice — it knows the way even when the path is hidden.

name: The Empress
daily_meaning: Nurture something or someone today — beauty blooms in your care.

name: The Emperor
daily_meaning: Take charge with steady hands — structure brings strength.

name: The Hierophant
daily_meaning: Tradition holds wisdom — seek counsel or honor rituals today.

name: The Lovers
daily_meaning: A choice may arise — follow your heart, not just your logic.

name: The Chariot
daily_meaning: You’re in the driver’s seat — go forward with confidence and control.

name: Strength
daily_meaning: Lead with gentle strength — compassion is your quiet power.

name: The Hermit
daily_meaning: Step back from the noise — your answers lie in silence and reflection.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny
daily_meaning: Change is turning the wheel — lean into destiny’s dance.

name: Justice
meaning: Fairness, truth, law, cause and effect
daily_meaning: Act with integrity — truth will find its balance.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspective
daily_meaning: Pause. Look again — perspective reshapes everything.

name: Death
daily_meaning: Let go — transformation awaits on the other side of endings.

name: Temperance
daily_meaning: Blend, balance, and be patient — harmony takes time.

name: The Devil
daily_meaning: Recognize your chains — and know you can break them.

name: The Tower
daily_meaning: Disruption clears the air — rebuild with wisdom from the ashes.

name: The Star
daily_meaning: Hope glimmers on your horizon — trust in renewal.

name: The Moon
daily_meaning: Mystery and dreams swirl — tread gently and trust your intuition.

name: The Sun
daily_meaning: Joy is radiant — share your light unapologetically today.

name: Judgement
daily_meaning: Reflect deeply — your future grows from honest reckoning.

name: The World
daily_meaning: Celebrate how far you’ve come — wholeness is within reach.
